page.title: 03SKIPPING SONGS IN HESSLE
page.content: Two children turn the rope with another jumping over it in the middle. "Not last night but the night before 24 robbers came knocking at my door They walked in, I walked out and this is what they said. Chinese ladies, turn around Chinese ladies touch the ground Chinese ladies do the splits." SECOND SONG: "Someone is under the bed Whoever can it be I felt so jolly nervous So------ came to me (Skipper chooses "Mary" to join her) Mary lit the candle Mary shouted OUT Get out, get out Before I kick you out."
